channel.title: OWASP_2017_A07 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in OWASP_2017_A07 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Cross Site Scripting (DOM Based)
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) is an attack technique that involves echoing attacker-supplied code into a user’s browser instance. A browser instance can be a standard web browser client, or a browser object embedded in a software product such as the browser within WinAmp, an RSS reader, or an email client.
